# Tehran War Cemetery

| longitude   =
| type        = Military Cemetery
| style       =
| owner       = Commonwealth War Graves Commission
| size        = 20,000 m
| graves      = 551
| website     =
| findagraveid= 2284581

Tehran War Cemetery () is a war cemetery located in Gholhak Garden in the Iranian capital city of Tehran and located within the British Embassy residential compound and is where over 500 British and Commonwealth soldiers who perished in the First and Second World Wars are buried. The site includes the Tehran Memorial, dedicated to those who have no known grave or whose grave is unmaintained. The cemetery is managed by the Commonwealth War Graves Commission.
The cemetery also has markers for those who died in Iran and Russia without graves.
